message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes an algorithm for reinforcement learning in continuous action spaces, which is a common problem in Robotics (cs.RO). The algorithm involves active exploration, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The exploration is controlled through a Boltzmann softmax function, which is a common technique in optimization and control theory (cs.SY). The paper also applies the algorithm to a virtual human-robot interaction task, which involves computer vision (cs.CV).
